[当]
Unorthodox variant of 當 / 当 . From cursive script .

[當]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *taːŋ, *taːŋs ): phonetic 尚 ( OC *djaŋ, *djaŋs ) + semantic 田 ( “ field ” ) – fields facing each other.

[張]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *taŋ, *taŋs ): semantic 弓 ( “ bow ” ) + phonetic 長 ( OC *taŋʔ, *daŋ, *daŋs ) .

[张]
Simplified from 張 ( 長 → 长 ).
